docs.snippet: R. Henry Norweb, United States Minister to the Dominican Republic, sails today on the Grace liner Santa Lucia, heading the United States delegation to the Inter-American Radio Communications Conference to be held in Santiago, Chile, the last week in...
docs.lead_paragraph: R. Henry Norweb, United States Minister to the Dominican Republic, sails today on the Grace liner Santa Lucia, heading the United States delegation to the Inter-American Radio Communications Conference to be held in Santiago, Chile, the last week in January. He will be accompanied by his wife.

docs.snippet: All the several hundred branches operated in the United States and foreign countries by Armour  Co., Illinois, and its consolidated subsidiaries are being turned over to Armour  Co., Delaware, under an operating agreement which will pave the way for...
docs.lead_paragraph: All the several hundred branches operated in the United States and foreign countries by Armour Co., Illinois, and its consolidated subsidiaries are being turned over to Armour Co., Delaware, under an operating agreement which will pave the way for an eventual merger of the two companies, it was learned yesterday.
docs.abstract: To take over Ill co and its subsidiaries

headline.main: MERGER FORECAST FOR ARMOUR UNITS; Delaware Subsidiary to Get Several Hundred Branches of Illinois Concern REVERSAL OF 1922 ACTION operating Agreement Will Be in Effect--Issue of Stock Bars Unity Now Unit in Industry Preferred Stock Issue

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 29 (AP)--President Alfredo Baldomir was reported tonight to have decided to give the German merchantman Tacoma, which took off part of the crew of the German raider Admiral Graf Spee before the pocket battleship was...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 29 (AP)--President Alfredo Baldomir was reported tonight to have decided to give the German merchantman Tacoma, which took off part of the crew of the German raider Admiral Graf Spee before the pocket battleship was scuttled, twenty-four hours to leave port or be interned.
docs.abstract: Tacoma given 24 hrs to leave or be interned

headline.main: URUGUAY TO ORDER THE TACOMA OUT; Ruling, on Ship as Graf Spee's Auxiliary, Indicates 24-Hour Internment Ultimatum RUN FROM MEXICO LIKELY Three of Reich Vessels There Reported Planning to Try Risk of Allied Blockade
MRS. E.B. SHERFESEE, ONCE HOOVER AIDE; Head of the American Fund for French Wounded Won Croix de Guerre--Titanic Survivor

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 30 (AP)--Great Britain tonight asked Uruguay to permit the cruiser Ajax to enter Montevideo harbor to repair damages received in her battle with the German pocket battleship Admiral Graf Spee on Dec. 13.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 30 (AP)--Great Britain tonight asked Uruguay to permit the cruiser Ajax to enter Montevideo harbor to repair damages received in her battle with the German pocket battleship Admiral Graf Spee on Dec. 13.
docs.abstract: Ajax seeks Uruguayan permission to enter harbor for repairs

headline.main: CRUISER AJAX SEEKS REPAIRS IN URUGUAY; Britain to Repair Damage Received in Fight With Spee
